ygData.subject: Controlling Pause/Resume/Checkpoint from outside of application in H3
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi I need to control Pausing, Resuming & Checkpointing of H3 from outside of application (e.g. using a python script). Is it possible? How? Thanks
